Documentation

Learn how to build your website with boba!

Grid

Grids provide the foundation you need to organize content.
Use a .row element to hold .col elements.
Unsized column elements will automatically expand to fill a row; Set specific widths from 1-12 using .[screen-size]-[width] classes.
Each row can hold a maximum of 12 column units. More information on screen-sizes can be found on boba's helper page.
one
auto
two
auto
three
auto
four
auto
five
auto
six
auto
seven
auto
eight
auto
nine
auto
ten
auto
eleven
auto
twelve 
<!-- A standard 3-column, responsive layout -->
<div class="row">
    <div class="col xs-12 sm-12 md-6 lg-4 xl-4">
        <!-- Content here -->
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-12 sm-12 md-6 lg-4 xl-4">
        <!-- Content here -->
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-12 sm-12 md-6 lg-4 xl-4">
        <!-- Content here -->
    </div>
</div>

Gapless Grid

Add the .gapless class to a .row to remove the gaps between the columns.

Gaps

.col .xs-4
.col .xs-4
.col .xs-4

Gapless

.col .xs-4
.col .xs-4
.col .xs-4 
<!-- A standard 3-column, gapless, responsive layout -->
<div class="row gapless">
    <div class="col xs-12 sm-12 md-6 lg-4 xl-4">
        <!-- Content here -->
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-12 sm-12 md-6 lg-4 xl-4">
        <!-- Content here -->
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-12 sm-12 md-6 lg-4 xl-4">
        <!-- Content here -->
    </div>
</div>

Offsets

Offset columns in a row by 1-11 units using .offset-[screen-size]-[width] classes to create unique layouts.
Each column can be offset by a maximum of 11 column units. More information on screen-sizes can be found on boba's helper page.
.col .xs-4
.col .xs-4 .offset-xs-4

.col .xs-6 .offset-xs-3
.col 
<div class="row">
    <div class="col xs-6 offset-xs-3">
        <div class="bg-orange text-center">
            .col .xs-6 .offset-xs-3
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col">
        <div class="bg-yellow text-center">
            .col
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Vertical Center Content

Easily vertically-center content within a column using the .vertical-center-content class.
.col .xs-4
.col .xs-4
.col .xs-4 
<div class="row">
    <div class="col xs-12">
        <div class="bg-green text-center vertical-center-content">
            .col .xs-12
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Column Alignment

Vertically align columns within a row.
.col-top
.col-middle
.col-bottom 
<div class="row">
    <div class="col col-top xs-4">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .col-top
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col col-middle xs-4">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .col-middle
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col col-bottom xs-4">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .col-bottom
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Row Alignment

Quickly set the vertical alignment of all columns within a row.

Row Align Top

Align all columns in a row to the top of the row.
.row-align-top
.row-align-top
.row-align-top 
<div class="row row-align-top">
    <div class="col xs-4">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-align-top
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-4">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-align-top
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-4">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-align-top
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Row Align Center

Align all columns in a row to the vertical center of the row.
.row-align-center
.row-align-center
.row-align-center 
<div class="row row-align-center">
    <div class="col xs-4">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-align-center
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-4">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-align-center
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-4">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-align-center
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Row Align Bottom

Align all columns in a row to the bottom of the row.
.row-align-bottom
.row-align-bottom
.row-align-bottom 
<div class="row row-align-bottom">
    <div class="col xs-4">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-align-bottom
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-4">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-align-bottom
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-4">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-align-bottom
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Row Align Stretch

All columns in a row will stretch to the max height of the row.
The effect is subtle, but trust us, it works!
.row-align-stretch
.row-align-stretch
.row-align-stretch 
<div class="row row-align-stretch">
    <div class="col xs-4">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-align-stretch
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-4">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-align-stretch
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-4">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-align-stretch
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Row Align Space Around

When a row wraps, each sub-row will have equal spacing around them on both sides, including the first/last rows.
.row-align-space-around
.row-align-space-around
.row-align-space-around
.row-align-space-around 
<div class="row row-align-space-around">
    <div class="col xs-6">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-align-space-around
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-6">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-align-space-around
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-6">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-align-space-around
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-6">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-align-space-around
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Row Align Space Between

When a row wraps, each sub-row will have equal spacing between them and the first/last rows will be flush to the containing element.
.row-align-space-between
.row-align-space-between
.row-align-space-between
.row-align-space-between 
<div class="row row-align-space-between">
    <div class="col xs-6">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-align-space-between
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-6">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-align-space-between
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-6">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-align-space-between
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-6">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-align-space-between
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Row Align Space Evenly

When a row wraps, each sub-row will have equal spacing around them, including the first/last rows.
.row-align-space-evenly
.row-align-space-evenly
.row-align-space-evenly
.row-align-space-evenly 
<div class="row row-align-space-evenly">
    <div class="col xs-6">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-align-space-evenly
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-6">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-align-space-evenly
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-6">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-align-space-evenly
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-6">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-align-space-evenly
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Row Justification

Quickly set the horizontal alignment of all columns within a row.

Row Justify Left

Left align all columns in a row.
.row-justify-left
.row-justify-left
.row-justify-left 
<div class="row row-justify-left">
    <div class="col xs-3">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-justify-left
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-3">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-justify-left
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-3">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-justify-left
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Row Justify Center

Center align all columns in a row.
.row-justify-center
.row-justify-center
.row-justify-center 
<div class="row row-justify-center">
    <div class="col xs-3">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-justify-center
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-3">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-justify-center
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-3">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-justify-center
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Row Justify Right

Right align all columns in a row.
.row-justify-right
.row-justify-right
.row-justify-right 
<div class="row row-justify-right">
    <div class="col xs-3">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-justify-right
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-3">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-justify-right
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-3">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-justify-right
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Row Justify Stretch

Stretch all columns in a row to fill the full width of the row.
Note: This only works for columns that do not have specified widths.
.row-justify-stretch
.row-justify-stretch
.row-justify-stretch 
<div class="row row-justify-stretch">
    <div class="col">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-justify-stretch
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-justify-stretch
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-justify-stretch
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Row Justify Space Around

Each column in a row will have equal spacing on both sides, including the first/last columns.
.row-justify-space-around
.row-justify-space-around
.row-justify-space-around 
<div class="row row-justify-space-around">
    <div class="col xs-3">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-justify-space-around
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-3">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-justify-space-around
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-3">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-justify-space-around
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Row Justify Space Between

Each column in a row will have equal spacing between them and the first/last columns will be flush to the containing row.
.row-justify-space-between
.row-justify-space-between
.row-justify-space-between 
<div class="row row-justify-space-between">
    <div class="col xs-3">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-justify-space-between
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-3">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-justify-space-between
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-3">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-justify-space-between
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Row Justify Space Evenly

Each column in a row will have equal spacing around them, including the first/last columns.
.row-justify-space-evenly
.row-justify-space-evenly
.row-justify-space-evenly 
<div class="row row-justify-space-evenly">
    <div class="col xs-3">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-justify-space-evenly
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-3">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-justify-space-evenly
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-3">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-justify-space-evenly
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Row Direction

Quickly change the order and direction of columns in a row.

Row Direction Row (Forward)

Default behavior for columns in a row; columns will appear in sequential order.
1
2
.row-direction-row 
<div class="row row-direction-row">
    <div class="col xs-3">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            1
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-3">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            2
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-6">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-direction-row
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Row Direction Row Reverse

Columns will appear in reverse-sequential order.
1
2
.row-direction-row-reverse 
<div class="row row-direction-row-reverse">
    <div class="col xs-3">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            1
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-3">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            2
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-6">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-direction-row-reverse
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Row Direction Column

Columns will appear vertically stacked in sequential order.
Note: Column direction will not respect specified column widths and will stretch all columns to fill one row each.
1
2
.row-direction-column 
<div class="row row-direction-column">
    <div class="col xs-3">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            1
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-3">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            2
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-6">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-direction-column
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Row Direction Column Reverse

Columns will appear vertically stacked in reverse-sequential order.
Note: Column direction will not respect specified column widths and will stretch all columns to fill one row each.
1
2
.row-direction-column-reverse 
<div class="row row-direction-column-reverse">
    <div class="col xs-3">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            1
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-3">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            2
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-6">
        <div class="bg-light text-center vertical-center-content">
            .row-direction-column-reverse
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
